metadata.title: Touching the Finger Slowly and Touching It Will Not Turn ON.

sections.content:
Question:
Why doesn't the device go ON when I slowly movie a finger closer to the electrode?
Answer:
The execution interval of the drift correction process may be short.
Please adjust so that the drift correction interval is longer.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
